name: Saint Soter
summary: Stephen Soter Ortynsky Hentosh, O.S.B.M. was an Austrian Catholic prelate who served as the first bishop of all Greek Catholics in the United States.
biography: Stephen Soter Ortynsky Hentosh, O.S.B.M. was an Austrian Catholic prelate who served as the first bishop of all Greek Catholics in the United States. He was a member of the Order of Saint Basil the Great.
